bioconda.name: bioconductor-acde
bioconda.summary: Artificial Components Detection of Differentially Expressed Genes

biotools.summary: This package provides a multivariate inferential analysis method for detecting DE genes. It uses artificial components, close to the data's principal components but with an exact interpretation in terms of differential genetic expression, to identify differentially expressed genes while controlling the false discovery rate (FDR).

bioschemas.name: acde
bioschemas.summary: This package provides a multivariate inferential analysis method for detecting DE genes. It uses artificial components, close to the data's principal components but with an exact interpretation in terms of differential genetic expression, to identify differentially expressed genes while controlling the false discovery rate (FDR).
